content: Hi, I am reaching out to provide you with a fantastic new lead generation solution! Are you interested in doubling your customer base?
Thank you for getting in touch with XYZ Home Services. We assist with plumbing, electrical, and HVAC needs. How can we help you today?
Your business really needs to try our latest sales boosting app! Can I set you up for a demonstration and get your email to send over more info?
It looks like your message might not be related to scheduling a home service appointment with us. If you have a plumbing, electrical, or HVAC issue, please let us know!
reason: Customer sent repeated sales messages unrelated to services offered.
